analysis.description:
GESTokenCrowdSale.forwardFunds (/unique_contracts/0x072e07394a4a0446b3c8f6cb6675f315c8729501.sol#490-491) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallet.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_contracts/0x072e07394a4a0446b3c8f6cb6675f315c8729501.sol#491)

Reentrancy in GESTokenCrowdSale.finaliseCrowdsale (/unique_contracts/0x072e07394a4a0446b3c8f6cb6675f315c8729501.sol#462-471):
	External calls:
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x072e07394a4a0446b3c8f6cb6675f315c8729501.sol#466-467)
	- FinalisedCrowdsale(token.totalSupply()) (/unique_contracts/0x072e07394a4a0446b3c8f6cb6675f315c8729501.sol#467-468)
	External calls sending eth:
	- forwardFunds() (/unique_contracts/0x072e07394a4a0446b3c8f6cb6675f315c8729501.sol#467)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalised (/unique_contracts/0x072e07394a4a0446b3c8f6cb6675f315c8729501.sol#468)

GESTokenCrowdSale.GESTokenCrowdSale (/unique_contracts/0x072e07394a4a0446b3c8f6cb6675f315c8729501.sol#381-425) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(tokenWallet,83594644 * 10 ** 18) (/unique_contracts/0x072e07394a4a0446b3c8f6cb6675f315c8729501.sol#424-425)

GESTokenCrowdSale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x072e07394a4a0446b3c8f6cb6675f315c8729501.sol#432-462) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,bonusedTokens) (/unique_contracts/0x072e07394a4a0446b3c8f6cb6675f315c8729501.sol#456-457)

GESTokenCrowdSale.finaliseCrowdsale (/unique_contracts/0x072e07394a4a0446b3c8f6cb6675f315c8729501.sol#462-471) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x072e07394a4a0446b3c8f6cb6675f315c8729501.sol#466-467)

GESTokenCrowdSale.hardCap should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x072e07394a4a0446b3c8f6cb6675f315c8729501.sol#358-360)
GESTokenCrowdSale.rate should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x072e07394a4a0446b3c8f6cb6675f315c8729501.sol#348)
GESTokenCrowdSale.saleMinimumWei should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x072e07394a4a0446b3c8f6cb6675f315c8729501.sol#356-357)
ERC20Basic.balanceOf (/unique_contracts/0x072e07394a4a0446b3c8f6cb6675f315c8729501.sol#38-39) should be declared external
